__e: I'm sorry, Miss Hill, I don't have a lot of time.
Ms. Hill is not at home.
Mr. Hill, I was brought into this world without a home and without kin.
Ladies, gentlemen, Sergeant Hill is here to get us all fit.
What? Why? Because you were here the night that Scott Hill was murdered.
No, I found it. The heart of Hill House.
Yes, what is the matter with Hill House?
But there's certainly something going on in Hill House.
And what's the connection between Sergeant Hill and my cold case?
See if Hill's in there, and if he is you'll bring him to us.
Yeah. What worries me is that Sergeant Hill was just killed two days ago, so is this smuggling ring still active?
Sergeant Hill had an accident minutes after your call.
Hill saw the text message you sent me last night.
Hill said there was a court case.
Which was to Mr. Hill, who wasn't really dead.
Maybe he's not the Hill brother who needs help.
Why did you tell Hill you murdered that family?
